actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Relating to the taxation of certain lump-sum benefit cancellation payments under the social security system of Saudi Arabia.

summary.text: Provides for the tax treatment of certain lump-sum benefit cancellation payments under the social security system of Saudi Arabia which are included in the gross income of a taxpayer.

titles.title: Relating to the taxation of certain lump-sum benefit cancellation payments under the social security system of Saudi Arabia.
